The Houses of Healing was an infirmary in Minas Tirith.
The Houses were surrounded by lawns and trees
column2: set near to the Citadel-gate and the southward wall in the sixth circle of Minas Tirith.

column1: The chief healer was the Warden of the Houses of Healing.
When Faramir had been saved from the pyre of Denethor
column2: Gandalf and Beregond carried him in a bier to the Houses of Healing
column3: with Peregrin Took following.  Soon Gandalf and Pippin departed but Beregond
column4: after reporting to the chief of the Guard
column5: went to the houses to serve and guard his captain.

column4: and others suffering from the Black Shadow.  Ioreth
column5: one of the few women permitted to stay in the city during the siege due to her healing skills
column6: wished aloud for a king since "The hand of the king are the hands of a healer."  Gandalf heard her and brought Aragorn into the Houses to tend the wounded.  Using athelas Aragorn was able to revive Faramir
column9: and Merry.  When Aragorn left the houses he found many waiting for him at the door and after eating he spent most of the night tending the wounded.

column1: While the Army of the West marched to the Black Gate
column2: the Lady Éowyn arose in the Houses of Healing and begged the Warden to be discharged.  The Warden brought her to Faramir
column3: now able to walk in the gardens of the houses
column4: where he dissuaded her from leaving.  As the days passed their love bloomed and after the fall of Sauron it was in the Houses of Healing that they plighted their troth.

column1: :Two scenes in the Houses of Healing were included in the extended edition: "The Houses of Healing (scene)" and "The Captain and the White Lady". The former depicts Aragorn healing Éowyn
column2: and features Houses of Healing (song) sung by Liv Tyler.
column3: "The Music of Middle-earth" Éomer was originally not included in the scene
column4: but Karl Urban thought it would be fitting if he were there.J.W. Braun
